actions.name: Disguise
actions.description: Effect: At the start of combat the user is @Affliction[disguised]. The first time the user takes damage in combat while @Affliction[disguised], they take 0 damage and the lose the @Affliction[disguised] Affliction. Afterward, this Ability cannot be used again until the end of the battle.
